eu.focusnet.app.model.widgets

Class WidgetInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.focusnet.app.model.AbstractInstance
      • eu.focusnet.app.model.widgets.WidgetInstance
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataCollectionWidgetInstance, InvalidWidgetInstance, LineChartWidgetInstance, PieChartWidgetInstance, TableWidgetInstance, TextWidgetInstance

    public abstract class WidgetInstance
extends AbstractInstance
    Abstract class being the common parent to all Widget instantiations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WidgetInstance

        public WidgetInstance(WidgetTemplate wTpl,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> layoutConfig,
                      @NonNull
                      DataContext dataCtx)
        C'tor for instantiating real widget instances. This constructor also acquires the widget configuration and frees memory when it does not need data structures anymore.
        Parameters:
        wTpl - Base widget template
        layoutConfig - Layout configuration
        dataCtx - Data context against which we will resolve data

      • WidgetInstance

        public WidgetInstance(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> layoutConfig,
                      DataManager dm)
        Dummy c'tor for InvalidWidgetInstance

        Parameters:

        layoutConfig - Layout configuration
        newCtx - Data context
        Returns:

        public int getNumberOfColumnsInUi()
        Return an integer that represents the number of columsn covered by the widget.
        Returns:

      • propagatePathLookup

        protected AbstractInstance propagatePathLookup(java.lang.String searchedPath)
        No need to return anything. We never refer to widget instances directly.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
